body:
### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
[ghartzell@bifx1n03 spack-update-kallisto]$ which spack
~/tmp/spack-update-kallisto/bin/spack
[ghartzell@bifx1n03 spack-update-kallisto]$ spack --version
0.9-11552-38d5d73
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack checksum kallisto
# tell it to just do 1 (which was 0.46.2 for me)
$ spack edit kallisto
# add the new version info
$ spack install kallisto
[+] /home/ghartzell/tmp/spack-update-kallisto/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.2.0/pkgconf-1.6.3-ohs2mgjc3t3mwk7tmvryh5r5rsuyyqvq
[+] /home/ghartzell/tmp/spack-update-kallisto/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-
[...]
==> Fetching https://github.com/pachterlab/kallisto/archive/v0.46.2.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/ghartzell/spack-stage/spack-stage-kallisto-0.46.2-2cya5t4j2epry6ttce7w2bm5eeoqurjf/v0.46.2.tar.gz
    Expected 49574ca9c714a23437b7dbc4f6979b944243af7da62df3a90181c5999e2785b9 but got c447ca8ddc40fcbd7d877d7c868bc8b72807aa8823a8a8d659e19bdd515baaf2

```

### Error Message

see above

### Information on your system

CentOS 7 on amd64.

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
    - see https://gist.github.com/hartzell/44eb1749ee93b9b63e4d8a36b5baad7d
title: spack checksum output fails when added to a package and spack install'ed
